snippet.title: Indigo OoT Romhack Playthrough with Developer Commentary
snippet.description:
Howdy! I've been wanting to do this for a while and somehow found the motivation to finally do it. This is a full playthrough of the Indigo demo with my commentary on version v0.1.11, which is not available publicly. (Not much important has changed since v0.1.10, the current public version, so don't worry). I share some of my thoughts and motivations that went into making the game, as well as interesting insights I've gained from watching other players. I hope you'll enjoy this!

My goal is to release another small demo by the end of the year, primarily aimed at testing all of the new items and mechanics we've created. This second demo will likely be the last public version until the full game is released.

TP Link model used in Indigo created by Skilar Babcock:
https://www.youtube.com/c/skilarbabcock

Skybox used in second dungeon created by Zel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXUJgD8VMY_yEHY8ebY4k-g

The Indigo team is no longer just me! I'll get a video in the future to introduce the rest of us. As always, share your complaints/suggestions/criticisms/praise in the comments!
